[CONTRIBUTING](https://notion-enhancer.github.io/about/contributing) GUIDE.

IN THE TEMPLATE MAY BE IGNORED OR REJECTED.
YOU MUST DELETE ALL TEXT ON OR ABOVE THIS LINE BEFORE SUBMITTING.
